name: Teriyaki Chicken Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb – Boneless, Skinless, Chicken Breast; diced into small pieces
1 – Red Bell Pepper, seeded and diced
1 8oz can – Sliced Water Chestnuts, drained and chopped
2/3 cup – Cashews or Peanuts, roughly chopped
enough – Romaine, Iceberg, or butter leaves
instructions: In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp sesame oil over medium-high heat
Add chicken and cook for 3-5 minutes or until cooked through and no longer pink in the center. Internal temp should read 165˚F / 74˚C. Remove onto a plate and tent with tin foil
Heat another 1 tbsp sesame oil over medium heat; add garlic and most (2/3) of the green onions. Saute for 30 seconds
Add pepper and water chestnuts. Cook for an additional 2 minutes
Stir in 2/3 of the teriyaki sauce (saving the rest for drizzling). Cook for 1 minute
Stir in chicken and carrots; mix thoroughly until mixture is evenly warm
Serve over lettuce leaves and garnish with cashews, green onion, sesame seeds, and Teriyaki
